code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import directoryReducer from"./directoryReducer";import userReducer from"./userReducer";import cartReducer from"./cartReducer";import shopReducer from"./shopReducer";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whitlist:["cart"]};var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
